thread.title: South Korea Pulls Out All the Stops to Fill Empty Seats

author: Timothy W. Martin
title: South Korea Pulls Out All the Stops to Fill Empty Seats
text:
PYEONGCHANG, South Korea—Wooing South Koreans to the Winter Olympics has become a national sport.
Organizers of the Pyeongchang Games, reeling from the eyesores created by sparse attendance in the event’s first week, are blasting the airwaves with ads, hosting daily K-Pop concerts and asking local schools for help. Across the country, local municipalities have vacuumed up group tickets and offered them free to residents.
With...
